    public class DefaultServerSessionFactory
extends AbstractSessionFactory
    Default TNCS session factory.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultServerSessionFactory(TcgProtocolBindingIdentifier tnccsProtocol, TnccsWriter<TnccsBatch> writer, TnccsReader<TnccsBatchContainer> reader, ImAdapterManager<ImvAdapter> adapterManager)
      Creates a default TNCS session factory using the given writer and reader as well as an adapter manager to adapt the IMV available to a session.
      DefaultServerSessionFactory(TcgProtocolBindingIdentifier tnccsProtocol, TnccsWriter<TnccsBatch> writer, TnccsReader<TnccsBatchContainer> reader, ImvHandlerBuilder imvHandlerBuilder, TnccsHandlerBuilder<TncsHandler> tncsHandlerBuilder, TnccsHandlerBuilder<TnccsValidationExceptionHandler> tnccsValExBuilder, TncsContentHandlerFactory tncsContentHandlerFactory, StateMachineBuilder<TncsContentHandler> stateMachineBuilder)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultServerSessionFactory

        public DefaultServerSessionFactory(TcgProtocolBindingIdentifier tnccsProtocol,
                           TnccsWriter<TnccsBatch> writer,
                           TnccsReader<TnccsBatchContainer> reader,
                           ImAdapterManager<ImvAdapter> adapterManager)
        Creates a default TNCS session factory using the given writer and reader as well as an adapter manager to adapt the IMV available to a session.
        Parameters:
        tnccsProtocol - the IF-TNCCS protocol identifier
        writer - the message writer
        reader - the message reader
        adapterManager - the IMV adapter manager

      • DefaultServerSessionFactory

        public DefaultServerSessionFactory(TcgProtocolBindingIdentifier tnccsProtocol,
                           TnccsWriter<TnccsBatch> writer,
                           TnccsReader<TnccsBatchContainer> reader,
                           ImvHandlerBuilder imvHandlerBuilder,
                           TnccsHandlerBuilder<TncsHandler> tncsHandlerBuilder,
                           TnccsHandlerBuilder<TnccsValidationExceptionHandler> tnccsValExBuilder,
                           TncsContentHandlerFactory tncsContentHandlerFactory,
                           StateMachineBuilder<TncsContentHandler> stateMachineBuilder)
        Creates a default TNCS session factory using the given writer and reader. Several builders are added to customize the session behavior.
        Parameters:
        tnccsProtocol - the IF-TNCCS protocol identifier
        writer - the message writer
        reader - the message reader
        imvHandlerBuilder - the builder to build an IMV message handler
        tncsHandlerBuilder - the builder to build a TNCS message handler
        tnccsValExBuilder - the builder to build a validation exception handler
        tncsContentHandlerFactory - the builder to build a content handler, which manages the IMV, TNCS and validation exception handler
        stateMachineBuilder - the builder to build a server state machine

        Creates a new session for a given connection.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection for the session
